title: Kossuthkifli
overview: A 19th century road movie with "bejgli", a diligence, love, betrayal and an informant network masked as a funeral service. Amad√© Swappach, Kossuth's army major and her freshly eloped lover Estella set out on a journey with a chest full of "bejgli", a charioteer and a meddling countess to Debrecen to investigate a suspected capital treason.
